Posts.Content: Afriend of mine beat stage 4 cancer with cannibis oil but i know 2 others where it did not help except with pain.I still take leaf juice hoping to keep my prostate cancer in remission.Ithink liposomol vit c has some promise it has no sideffects .I have made my own and and i will take 8 grams a day .Radiation with stage 4 cancer is pallitive care .And chemo is something 75%of doctors would not take themselves,Try the liposomol c from lets talk health or livon labs because what she is taking now has a 2 to 4 %success rate and she would have a better chance with the c mho
Posts.Title: why doesn't radiation cure
